function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Existing buildings not designed to reduce transmission of communicable diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within buildings","Mitigation":"Retrofitting and engineering controls to improve indoor air quality and reduce disease transmission","Technologies":"Indoor plants, botanical biofilters, bioreactors","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building owners, facility managers"}]}
